title: Soldier attacked by PFI terrorists in Kerala
selftext:
Soldier was attacked by extremists in Kerala. Full picture yet to be disclosed. 

https://www.livemint.com/news/india/army-jawan-attacked-in-kerala-miscreants-tied-his-hands-wrote-pfi-on-back-11695634401230.html
comments: Turned out to be staged by the soldier and his friend.
Source. Kindly paste the link here
Videos are running in local channels but interestingly the national portals are not picking it up despite the news going viral within Kerala
Knobs like that should be sent to prison for along time. The fake story got allot of attention on the Kerala sub and I thought that was a liberal sub. People were jumping to conclusions.
